bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Power Plant De-Nitrogen Oxide (DeNOx) Plate-Type Catalyst
IEEE Standard for Power Plant De-Nitrogen Oxide (DeNOx) Plate-Type Catalyst

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Criteria for testing methods and technical parameters for geometrical features, physical and chemical properties, and de-nitrogen oxides (DeNO<sub>x</sub>) technological properties of power plant DeNO<sub>x</sub> plate-type catalysts are established in this standard.

Criteria for testing methods and technical parameters for geometrical features, physical and chemical properties, and de-nitrogen oxides (DeNOx) technological properties of power plant DeNOx plate-type catalysts are established in this standard.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
